entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts. He is mentioned as having a conversation with Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts and has a conversation with Dumbledore.

entities.name: armando dippet
entities.description: Armando Dippet is an old headmaster of Hogwarts. He is mentioned as being depicted in a portrait.

relationships.description: Harry and Dumbledore have a conversation about Harry's actions.
Armando Dippet is mentioned in the context of Harry's conversation with Dumbledore.
